name: anteversion
content:

(of a body part) the state of sloping forwards: The normal position of the uterus, when the bladder is empty, is that of anteversion. Femoral anteversion and excessive external tibial torsion are often seen in patients with the condition. These conditions can either be an anteversion or retroversion of the hip. Related word
